inn1.comm: on target right away, Simmons plays the good length ball back to the bowler
a bit of away movement for Praveen, Simmons lets it go to Parthiv
good length around off once again, Simmons defends on the off side
fuller length around off with some shape away from Simmons who moves forward and towards the ball to defend
more movement away from Simmons who stays in his crease and shoulders arms
Praveen begins with a maiden, Simmons stays back and blocks another good length delivery towards the off
and bowls a perfectly-pitched delivery to Kirk Edwards, beaten comprehensively outside off stump

caught behind! Edwards nicks this to Parthiv, who takes a low catch, and there's a bit of a delay before umpire Ian Gould raises the finger. Perfect length once again just outside off, Edwards pushed forward at it, playing away from his body, sizeable edge, tame dismissal
Munaf is off target this time, straying down leg side, Sarwan gets inside the line
fuller ball outside off, Sarwan moves forward and plays to cover
Sarwan moves across to defend towards the bowler this time
a bit too straight from Munaf, allowing Sarwan to play off his pads towards midwicket
good line and length just outside off, Sarwan stays in his crease and lifts his bat out of the way
good length with movement away from Simmons, who lets the ball go
this one pitches wider outside off and moves further away, Simmons lets it go again and looks expectantly at a rather stationary umpire
Simmons pushes the ball towards wide mid-off and runs the single before Harbhajan can move to his left and prevent it
once again Praveen bowls extremely wide outside off, and this too hasn't been called. Praveen's lucky
closer to the batsman outside off, that away movement is still there, Sarwan lets it go, the carry isn't good to Parthiv, bounces before him
left alone once again outside off
Munaf the metronome hits a good length around off once again, Simmons defends off the back foot
and the metronome goes missing, bowling one on the pads, Simmons takes advantage by glancing to the fine-leg boundary
straight line once again, Simmons moves across to flick the ball through midwicket
better line and length from Munaf, back to his off-stump staple, Sarwan stays in his crease and blocks
nicely run! Sarwan plays the ball with soft hands towards backward point and Simmons initiated the call, and moved decisively and quickly
Simmons moves forward and drives a length ball to the fielder at cover
the carry for Praveen is really poor, Parthiv collecting at ankle height after Sarwan lets it go outside off
Praveen pitches on middle and leg, Sarwan taps it into the midwicket region and runs
Simmons moves across in his crease and plays a short of a length ball towards cover
Simmons jumps across in his crease to exploit the sparsely-manned leg-side field, he plays the ball through midwicket
Praveen's flirting with that line outside off, extremely wide again, but the umpire reckons it's just inside that tram line
this one is shorter and straighter, catches Sarwan on the back foot and the outside edge drops short of gully
good length ball outside off, far more carry for Munaf than there is for Praveen, the batsman lets it go
Simmons presses forward and outside off to defend towards cover
short ball and Simmons attempts to pull and makes rather awkward contact, turning his head away as the ball hit bat, he managed to clear the in field though and the ball trickled to the boundary

there's no awkwardness about this! Simmons lines up a length delivery and lofts it with a wonderfully straight bat over long-on, first six of the day, Simmons needs to carry on for long today, that's his failing, looks so good at the start and gives it away after 40-50
punched crisply off the back foot through cover
short of a length on the hips, Simmons glances towards square leg
poor line, on the pads, Sarwan glances it cleanly to the fine leg boundary, there's life in this innings after all!
Sarwan stays in his crease, moves across, and plays towards mid-on
defended from the crease towards the bowler
fuller and slower, played back to the bowler who can't stop it
good length outside off stump, Sarwan stays put and defends on the off side
played off the back foot towards cover
played back to the bowler again
good length ball on off and middle, the batsman covers for the line and defends on the leg side
Simmons moves back and punches the short of a length ball towards the man at short cover
played towards cover once again
good length in that channel outside off stump, played towards short cover
shot! Simmons presses forward, and towards the off to pull a short ball from outside off over midwicket, the pace on this surface is far too slow to bowl that length
played towards mid-on for a quick single
and on cue Simmons pushes the ball towards mid-off and sets off for a quick single
the line is a bit too straight and Sarwan works the ball off the pads behind square
Simmons forces the ball off the back foot just wide of the man at mid-on and calls Sarwan through
fuller ball on middle, Sarwan leans forward and plays the on-drive to mid-on
Sarwan moves across and flicks this wide of the man at mid-on, for a single this time
his first ball is down leg and Sarwan sweeps towards fine leg
Sarwan takes on Mishra, coming forward to a flighted delivery, the ball pitches and turns away but Sarwan has it covered, bringing his bat down in a wonderful arc to loft it over the bowler's head
flatter ball on leg stump, played off the pads behind square
defended from the crease on the off side, some Indians appeal, what for I'm not sure
Simmons tries to sweep but can't make contact
this time he takes one hand off the bat while sweeping behind square
strays on to leg stump, Simmons glances it off his pads behind square
Sarwan stays in his crease, gets on top of the bounce of a short of a length delivery and taps it behind point
Simmons moves a bit across and taps the ball towards the leg side for a quick single, the dot balls have disappeared
that wasn't too short but there was width outside off, Sarwan moved forward and cut the ball through the gap at backward point, deft stroke and precisely placed
fuller and straighter ball, Sarwan drives but mid-on moves to his left to cut it off
Sarwan moves forward to drive and mis-times it, perhaps trying to hit it a bit too hard, the fielder at mid-off dives to his left to keep the batsmen to one
Mishra pitches around off and spins it away, Sarwan lets it go
Sarwan moves back and flicks it late through square, Mishra isn't turning the ball like he was in Trinidad
played off the pads through midwicket
slightly short and Sarwan plays off the back foot towards point
Sarwan presses forward to one that pitches on a good length around middle and closes the face to play the ball behind square
Simmons strides forward, opens the face to account for the turn and defends on the off side
short of a length outside off, cut towards cover
punched off the back foot towards cover
Simmons plays the ball with soft hands towards cover and runs one, and then runs a second as there is an overthrow at the keeper's end
too full with width outside off, Simmons moves forward and drives the ball cleanly through the gap between cover and point, well timed
opens the face to play the length ball towards point
Simmons moves forward and drives the fuller ball towards long-on
defended on the front foot on the leg side
Simmons pushes forward and defends, on the off side this time
Simmons plays the ball towards cover and thinks about running, and then stops
that's short and down leg side, Simmons gets down on one knee and sweeps towards fine leg
played off the front foot towards midwicket
Sarwan gets a touch squared up as he attempts to play on the leg side off the back foot but eventually has to push towards the off
pitches on leg and spins into the batsman, past the bat and into the stomach, Simmons picks it up and gives it back to the bowler
played towards point
Simmons moves forward and flicks the ball towards midwicket

Sarwan could be in big trouble here! He is, he's gone, run out! Simmons called Sarwan for a quick single after playing the ball towards short square leg. Sarwan isn't a quick runner and he was slow while setting off. The fielder from midwicket swooped on the ball, picked it up with one hand and threw it back to Parthiv. As Sarwan attempted to slide his bat, it got stuck in the ground and he dropped it. Once that happened, he had no chance. He might have been out even if he had his bat. He was looking so fluent, big blow for West Indies
defends off the back foot towards the leg side
Simmons leans forward to drive a full ball against the turn to midwicket
Simmons gets down on one knee and sweeps the ball fine
a touch short outside off and Simmons cuts off the back foot to deep point
loud appeal for lbw as Samuels presses forward to defend and gets hit on the pad, it was the googly but the impact was outside off stump
Samuels plays off the back foot towards cover
defended from the crease towards the off side
Simmons looks to budge off the front foot on the off side but doesn't connect properly
Simmons moves back and cuts towards Mishra at deep backward point
tries to play on the leg side but gets hit on the pad
Samuels gets going by working one off the pads behind square
defended on the off side
played back to the bowler
defended on the front foot towards the off
driven firmly, but back to the bowler
Samuels moves forward and defends once again

stumped! Samuels came down the pitch, trying to force the ball through midwicket. He was beaten in the flight, the ball dipped and pitched on middle, spun past the closing face of Samuels bat, and Parthiv did the rest
defended on the front foot on the off side
defended towards cover on the front foot
Harbhajan delivers on middle and off from round the wicket, Simmons defends on the front foot
Simmons moves back and plays the ball off his pads to short fine leg
tossed up on off stump, driven off the front foot to long off
Hyatt presses forward to defend and gets an inside edge on to the leg side
Simmons tries to glance the ball fine, but misses and is hit on the pad. Harbhajan pitching on leg from round the wicket
played towards point for a single
pushed towards cover and Hyatt sets off from the non-striker's end for a non-existent single, Simmons sends him back. The throw is poor and Mishra didn't get back quickly enough
played towards point off the back foot
played through midwicket for a single
Hyatt gets squared up by a quick legbreak and is beaten

it's all coming apart for West Indies once again. Familiar scenes. Hyatt saw one tossed up outside off, inviting the drive, and he obliged. He didn't know it was a googly and threw his bat at it, playing away from the body. The ball went off the inside edge on to his stumps. Poor shot from the debutant.
whoa! Mishra rips the flighted legbreak from middle stump across the forward push of Pollard, beaten all ends up as they say
Simmons, whose been watching the unravelling of the innings, defends on the leg side
nudged off the pads through square, midwicket has to chase
Pollard pushes forward tentatively to defend and gets an inside edge towards the leg side ...
defended once again on the leg side
played off the back foot towards fine leg
Simmons moves forward and plays the ball with soft hands towards cover

and Simmons too has fallen. The sad story gets sadder. Simmons pushed forward at a loopy legbreak, dipping on the batsman and pitching around middle and off. Simmons couldn't cover for the turn and the ball spun away, taking the edge towards Kohli at first slip
tossed up on off stump, Baugh drives to cover
Baugh strides forward and defends
defended on the front foot to silly point
Baugh thrusts forward and defends once again, on the leg side
a quicker and straighter ball, Baugh pushes forward and blocks
Pollard mis-times the front foot drive to mid-off
Pollard goes deep into his crease and gets squared up as he defends, awkward, rather awkward
Harbhajan pitches outside leg and then spins down leg side
Pollard strides forward and defends on the off side
that's fired down leg side once again
Pollard is beaten outside off as he tries to defend on the front foot
Pollard moves back and across to work the ball off his pads behind square. Harbhajan bowled that from over the wicket.
Baugh strides forward and blocks
played through midwicket off the front foot
another googly outside off, Pollard lets it go
defended on the off side once again
pushed towards mid on off the front foot
tossed up on middle, Pollard drives to mid on
Baugh moves forward and then cuts the ball, after seeing that it is short and outside off
Pollard drives once again, off the front foot to long-on
Baugh pushes forward, and defends to short leg
Baugh gets off the mark with an odd prod off the front foot behind square

caught behind! After an age, umpire Malcolm gives Pollard his marching orders. Pollard played back and prodded at one outside off stump, Parthiv caught it and had no doubt in his mind, or if he did, he appealed very convincingly. Pollard is disappointed and walks off very slowly. I can't tell if there was an edge or not, looking at initial replays.
defended on the leg side
Sammy defends to the man at short leg once again
defended towards cover off the back foot
Sammy thrusts his pad forward and lets a legbreak go outside off
Sammy goes back and across to turn the ball behind square
Baugh goes back to a big legbreak, is a bit far away from the ball, and reaches out to play it behind point
Baugh plays off the back foot towards third man
played towards cover
Baugh pushes forward and defends, again
Baugh goes back this time and nudges the ball behind square
Sammy gets hit on the pad and lobs up behind the keeper for leg byes
a hopeful appeal from Harbhajan, that hit him on the pad outside off stump
Sammy stays in his crease and nudges behind square
Baugh blocks. Enough said.
Sammy didn't pick the googly and went to cut it. He was cramped for room but because the turn was slow he was able to get bat on ball
Sammy thrusts forward to a legbreak and defends
Sammy goes back to a shorter ball and drives through cover point
driven off the front foot towards cover
nudges off the pas behind square
Baugh pushes forward, plays the ball on the leg side and runs
Baugh blocks, with uncertainty rather than confidence.
Baugh goes back and dabs the ball on the leg side
Baugh punches the ball off the back foot to cover
loud appeal for lbw as Baugh defends on the front foot, bat and pad were close together, and outside the line of off stump
played back to the bowler off the back foot
Baugh strides forward and defends on the off side
and he hits a good length, which makes the batsman defend
another appeal from Munaf and Parthiv after Sammy tries to play a cover drive to a length ball that moved away from him and was beaten, there was no edge there

there was certainly an edge this time! Munaf pitched the ball short of a length around off and moved it away a touch, Sammy was squared up on the back foot and poked tentatively at it, Parthiv didn't bother with an appeal this time, started celebrating immediately after catching it. Sammy looks such a dejected figure on his walk back
full ball on off stump, driven by Andre Russell to cover
good length delivery on off and middle, played off the front foot towards midwicket
Russell stays back and pokes at one outside of stump and is beaten, that kept low
he runs to his right and dives to cut off the stroke from the batsman
Baugh defends on the front foot towards the off
Russell tries to defend but gets into a tangle, the ball hit a few things, pad definitely
defended on the leg side
Russell backs away to an off break and plays a risky cut behind point, hit that from in front of his stumps
played with soft hands off the back foot towards backward point
good length on off, defended on the front foot
Baugh leans forward and opens the face to play towards third man, West Indies have got to 100. And there's some applause.
Russell stays in his crease, gets behind the line, and defends towards the bowler
Russell tries to pull a short ball but plays the shot too early, he gets hit on the body
Russell manages to drive the ball through point for a single
fuller ball on middle, Baugh leans forward and closes the face to play through square
played back to the bowler, Yusuf dives to his left to field and the ball deflects off his body on to the stumps, Russell was safe
played towards point for a single
once again Russell plays the cut from very close to his stumps
defended on the back foot
Russel tries to play the ball behind square and is hit on the pad
Russell sweeps the ball from outside off towards deep square leg
Baugh stays in his crease and chops the ball into the ground towards point
Baugh tries to cut without really moving his feet and is beaten
Baugh moves across to flick the ball through midwicket
played off the back foot towards the leg side
played towards midwicket from the crease
played towards mid-on with soft hands and Baugh sprints to retain strike.
tossed up, by Yusuf's standards, Baugh drives down the ground
defended on the leg side
driven towards the non-striker, who Yusuf barges into as he tries to field the ball but fails, no harm done
played towards Raina at midwicket
clipped off the pads through square leg and they run quickly between the wickets
Baugh moves back to nudge the ball from off stump towards point
finally! Russell latches on to a length ball that has width and flat-bats it through cover, he hit that with power and scored the first boundary since the 13th over
Praveen replies with a fuller and quicker ball outside off that beats Russell's forward push, that seamed away a touch as it passed the bat
edged and wide of Parthiv for four! Russell poked from the crease tentatively at one that moved away from him. Luckily for him the edge was thick and evaded the keeper
played on the off side, he got a bit squared up this time
full and straight, Russell gets behind the line and blocks
punched off the back foot towards mid-off, there's a direct hit from Munaf but Baugh is home
Russell moves forward and plays the ball to short third man
Russell cuts and gets it past the fielder at short third man, Harbhajan fields on the boundary
Russell cuts again, this time the ball goes more directly to Harbhajan so there's only a single available
Baugh cuts, this time, but the fielder at point - substitute Manoj Tiwary - dives to his right and cuts it off
played to point where Tiwary fields again
more work for Harbhajan at deep point as the batsman cuts again
Baugh reaches out to cut a wide ball and plays to third man
short of a length on off stump, Russell defends on the back foot
played towards deep midwicket for a single, where Rohit Sharma fields, haven't seen much of him today
played from the crease through square leg
up and over! Russell gets down on one knee and carves the length ball over short third man to the boundary
short and slow ball, Russell has to wait for a while for the ball to reach him and then play the swat,he loses his balance as well after hitting the ball behind square
played towards cover for a quick single, a deft tap
defended on the leg side off the back foot
Russell moves across, gets down low and then sweeps to deep backward square
defended back to the bowler
played towards extra cover
Baugh moves back and works the ball off his pads behind square
Baugh moves forward and defends on the leg side
Baugh tries to work the ball on the leg again, but can't
nudged with soft hands towards cover point for a scampered single
Russell gets down on one knee, gets under the ball and slams the ball with a powerful swing of the bat, sending the ball over the pool beyond the midwicket boundary
and this is bigger! Russell once again gets under the ball and hits with the turn over the midwicket boundary, he's carted this out of the ground, Yusuf Pathan getting a bit of his own medicine
flatter and quicker, defended back to the bowler
played off the back foot to midwicket
played off the pads behind square
flat, quick and straight, Russell defends from the crease
Russell gets down on one knee and sweeps to fine leg, West Indies reach 150, didn't think they'd make it
played towards Pathan at square leg
Baugh ends the over by defending to cover
Russell gets behind the line of a good length ball and blocks
Russell aims to go over cover, where there are no fielders in the deep, but gets an outside edge to third man
Baugh moves forward and drives towards mid-off, where Munaf chases and uses his boot to stop the ball
Baugh gets behind the line of a good length ball and blocks
full ball on off stump, driven into the ground towards cover
Baugh would have been gone had there been a direct hit at the bowler's end, Kohli was the fielder at midwicket and he missed
flat, fast and a touch short. Baugh stays in his crease and defends on the off side
this is slower, and Baugh glances behind square
Russell moves forward and opens the face of the bat to play behind point
a bit short on leg stump and Russell mis-times the pull to deep square leg
Baugh tries to play the slog sweep but misses, he gets hit on the pad
Baugh nudges off the front foot towards cover for a quick single
Munaf returns and for once doesn't start on target, strays down leg side and concedes a wide
Baugh has width to work with and cuts, can't place it past the fielder at point though
good length outside off stump, Baugh opens the face to steer towards third man
full ball, Munaf was looking for the yorker, Russell makes room and drives it hard towards long-on, poor running between the wickets from Baugh
cut once again towards third man
shot! Russell makes room to a length delivery outside off and slaps it through the gap between cover and extra cover
Russell was aiming for down the ground but ended up slicing the ball in the air over extra cover, falls safely in the midfield
Baugh gets inside the line and pulls this one towards long leg
played off the back foot towards extra cover
I'm not sure he intended to hit that through cover, he looked to want to go down the ground, the outside edge flew through the gap at cover though, and three runs resulted
played towards backward point and there's a minor mix-up between the batsmen
short ball and Russell's powerful pull is blocked by the man at deep midwicket
defended back to the bowler, Harbhajan's done for the day, a tidier spell than the one in the second ODI
full ball nearly in the blockhole, Russell manages to force it out towards long leg
Blake's jinxed him! Baugh tried to go over the top, aiming for the straight boundary. He was beaten by a slower ball and ended up lobbing an easy catch to cover
blockhole delivery, Roach defends on the leg side
defended on the off side, Russell is itching to get on strike and wanted a single, Roach said no
slower ball on off stump, Roach defends on the off side
another slowish ball, the length is shorter, Roach gets behind the line and blocks
bowled flat down leg side, takes the pad towards short fine leg
Russell tries to swing across the line and gets hit on the pad, Raina appeals for lbw, would have missed leg
driven to the fielder at long off
Roach turns the strike over with a drive to Yusuf at long off
bat up Andre Russell! He gets to fifty with a cut to deep point, it's his maiden ODI fifty as well, and at a crucial time
played towards midwicket for a single
Roach clips the ball off his pads and the fielder at short fine leg saves four by diving to his right
that full toss has disappeared. Russel made room, swung his arms hard and thumped it into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on.
the slower ball and Russell's attempted heave is mis-timed towards the bowler
Russell makes room once again and muscles the ball towards the cow corner region, long-on moves to his right and fields
full ball outside off, driven towards long-off

the slower ball, a low full toss as well, and Roach clips it through the leg side, the throw comes in towards Munaf who lazily sticks out a leg in a ridiculous attempt to stop the ball. Russell was safe though, it must be said.
Russell clears his front foot and slogs the ball hard towards long on, the fielder can't cut it off
caught by Ishant Sharma, who's several yards beyond the long-on boundary. Russell used his power to simply heave the ball.
and again! Russell goes over midwicket and into the stands, moved his front foot out of the way, swung freely, swung hard and watched the ball disappear
cut hard, very hard, Harbhajan has to race to his left on the point boundary to field it
Russell swings, but misses this time
22 runs off the over! He doesn't miss this time! Russell aims for cow corner once again and pierces the gap with a powerful slog sweep
good man, Roach nudges the ball off his pads towards midwicket
in the blockhole and Russell only manages to dig it out through midwicket
Roach reaches out for a wide one and drives hard to cover, he runs anyway and the fielder doesn't throw
Russell is cramped for room by a full ball angling into him but he manages to force it towards deep midwicket and keep strike

Russell has sent this out of the stadium with an almighty heave. Hope a car wasn't under the descending ball. He moved his front foot to create hitting space and hit it he did, miles over deep midwicket
terrific finish. Russell ends the innings by making room and pulling the ball flat with immense power, it fell a foot short of the boundary. Top innings.

inn2.comm: wayward start from the bowler,  a very full and very wide ball outside  off, Parthiv gets bat to it but Pollard pulls off a diving stop at point
short of a length from Roach now in to Parthiv's body, he is hurried for pace as he shuffles to play it out to midwicket
hurried even more this time, this one is around middle and he misses as he tries to work it away
goes fuller now, and Parthiv is able to flick it off his pads down to fine leg to get off strike
Shikhar somehow managed to keep this rising back of a length ball down in front of square leg and Parthiv pushed him to go for the tight single
reaches out to a widish one outside off to guide it away to third man
runs in and bowls it around a length, Parthiv is not in control as he pushes forward but gets enough on it to push it between the bowler and mid on
beats him outside off stump, he is running in with purpose, bending his back, Parthiv reached out and decided to have a poke as it left him outside off, and missed
this time Parthiv is wiser, the ball is wider, and there is no poking, he shoulders arms immediately
still wider, keeps very low as Parthiv makes no attempt to play at it
Parthiv swivels on one leg and pulls a short of a length ball, not much timing on it, and he gets a single backward of square leg
snorter from Russell, Shikhar picks it up early and sways out of the line as the ball screams up from back of a length
Roach continues with his pacy short of a length in to the body and the batsman is pegged on the back foot as he plays it down on the leg side, no  chance of a run
this one is angled across on a length and he is able to get behind the line to push it to cover
pings point with the back foot punch, the stroke was well timed but he can't beat the off side infield
tried to clip a fuller one off the toes but was squared up in the end as he stabbed it down the track
whipped off the pads this time for the single to long leg
tries to dab a length ball from close to the body towards third man, but chops it on the off side towards point
gets the edge, he had set himself up for the drive through covers but the ball did not get up much and took the bottom part of the bat to roll away to first slip
this one bounces fine now, and is pushed away wide of mid off
Russell oversteps, the batsman had backed away a touch outside leg to force it away but was struck on the pads
the free hit is a wayward full toss wide outside off, but Shikhar bends the knee to languidly guide it to squarish third man
just short of the man at mid on, Parthiv tried to whip it off the pads, it was in the air for some time but Edwards made no attempt to come forward
punched off the back foot but that man Pollard is patrolling point, and the ball cannot sneak past his diving frame
this one bounced a touch more than he expected and he adjusted to play it towards mid off
makes room outside leg stump, goes on the toes and quietly pats a shortish one down the track
Parthiv is living dangerously, this time it is a leading edge from leg stump that goes just wide of cover as Parthiv tries to clip it through midwicket, oh well, it is a no ball anyway
Parthiv backs away outside leg and gives the free hit everything his little frame can manage, but it is a slow offcutter and he can't make contact
can't get this one away either, pushed away towards extra cover
goes hard for the pull off a short one in to the body but will get only a single to long leg
Shikhar stays beside the line and guides it towards point
very full ball from Roach now, Shikhar pings mid off with a forceful push
short and wide and Parthiv slashes it in Calypso fashion on a leg, fortunately it bounces just in front of third man running across to his left
beaten outside off stump, another short ball and Shikhar tried to cut it, but it was close to the body and bounced extra as well
eases a length ball past Pollard at point for a single
forces it down to mid off, India's openers just not finding the gaps
short of a length and Parthiv tries to smash it out of sight, but is nowhere close to the ball
watches one angled wide outside off stump go to the keeper
uses the angle across him to push a length ball off the front foot, but straight to point
stays beside the line now to slash it from the crease but third man is very square
88.8 mph and Parthiv is struck on the pads as he shuffles a long way to try and tuck it past square leg
he is going nowhere at the moment, now tries to whip a short of a length ball wide of midwicket, there is no timing on the shot
lots of timing on this one alright, did not go hard, just stayed in the crease, and drove a length ball through covers for the first boundary of the innings
and now he has two in two, Parthiv goes aerial now, fuller length but close to the pads and he shuffles to pick it way over midwicket and in to the boundary
gentle pace from Sammy as he angles a length ball past the left-hander who goes hard at it but misses
goes forward to push a ball going across in to covers
Sammy strikes, and he is pleased as he does a little jig, Shikhar lunges out to drive lazily away from the body, and spoons it to cover who tumbles forward to take a neat low catch

well, well, Darren Sammy has brought the sparse crowd to life, he has snared Virat first ball, that harmless looking length ball that suddenly decides to nip back in sharply, Virat is caught on the crease and takes it on the pads, that looked to be going down leg, the umpire did not think so, in fact it would have bounced over as well as replays show, shocker that one but Virat is gone, what was that about the DRS again?

walks across the stumps as Sammy sprays it down the leg side, Badri tries to tickle it fine but cannot beat the keeper, it almost carried to him to keep Sammy interested, but dropped short, not clear if it was off bat or pad
this one keeps very low now, it was dead on the stumps, but Badri managed to keep it out
a half-hearted jab, not a push, not a drive, just jabs a very full ball away on the off side
pushed away towards covers

Parthiv arches back and gets on top of a short of a length ball to cut it over point, third man comes charging in, puts in the big dive, and seems to have saved some runs after numerous replays, who is it? it is Andre Russell, he can do no wrong
and now it is Roach in to the act, searing bouncer that has Badri hopping and simultaneously bending his back to get underneath the missile as it shoots up at his head
patted back down the track off the back foot
shuffles a long way across and tucks a length ball in front of midwicket
stands on the back foot prepared for the one that comes back in, but this one does not and he adjusts belatedly to punch it towards covers
goes on the back foot to cut a shortish one outside off but cannot beat point
conventional straight-batted ball-smothering front-foot defence from Badri, the ball rolls away limply on the off side
shuffles across to tuck it away in front of square leg
angled in on the pads, but he can't get it away as he plays it out towards mid on
stands beside the line and calmly guides a length ball to point, Sammy's figures read 2-2-0-2
plonks front foot forward and across and brings bat further in front to whip a length ball over square leg, PArthiv has to rush back for the second in the end and makes it just in time

Parthiv has lived on the edge throughout this innings, and has never fallen off it, short ball banged in, he walks across and gets a big top edge on the pull, Bishoo can't do anything with it as it goes in to the fine leg boundary
reaches out to cut a short and wide one but cannot get it in to any sort of gap
so Parthiv uses the angle on the incoming ball to work it to midwicket
this one is wide and goes straight on outside off, Parthiv throws his bat at it and misses
that will do, Parthiv gets behind this short ball, it does not get up much and he happily pounces on it to pull it past midiwicket
takes two steps down the track, and works a short of a length ball towards square leg
worked away off the pads for another single through square leg
again Badri walks out but this time he can only push it away to point
West Indies are throwing themselves around at the moment, this time it is Simmons who covers a lot of space to cut off the single to the left of point
lunges forward a long way and drives in the air, opens the face of the bat to get it in the gap between cover and point
meets the ball early once more with a little walk down the track and this time Simmons at point cannot prevent the single to third man
goes forward to work a flat ball in front of square leg
Parthiv can't decide what to do with this one, he comes down the track but tones down the aggression to stab it on the leg side in the end
ore conviction this time and he gets the single down the ground towards mid on
there is the outside edge, but Badri goes at it with soft hands and the ball falls short of Sammy at slip
defended solidly off the front foot down the track
pushes away a flatter one down towards mid on
short of a good length outside off, it's cut towards point
smacks it hard, short of a good length, Parthiv charges down the track and swats that over Sammy's head for a boundary
fullish on middle, driven back wristily towards Sammy
goodish length outside off, opens the face to run it down to third man for a single
slightly short on middle and off, drops it down into the off side
shortish on the off, waits for it to come on, chops it down towards point
flighted by Bishoo, comes down the track to get to the pitch and drives it wide of mid-off for a single
appeal for a stumping, turns away after landing on a good length, Badri gets forward to defend, misses and Baugh takes off the bails, replays show Badri's foot is inside the crease
cut away into the off side
guided past point for a single
the googly, shortish outside off, slapped straight to extra cover
bowls it full on the off stump, dug out into the off side
good length on the off stump, Badrinath rocks forward and defends that to extra cover, stifled appeal from Sammy who thought it was pad first
steps up this time does Badri, fuller and he made room against that one and drove it hard past extra cover for a boundary

run-out, Badri has to go, Indian in a bit of trouble now, driven hard wide of mid-off, Russell slides to his left and returns accurately at the striker's end, Badri had called for a single but was sent back, by the time he turned around and dived, it was too late
gets on the front foot and defends that solidly towards extra cover
short of a good length, stands tall and crunches it towards point
appeal for a catch but it's called a wide, Rohit chased at a wide one, needlessly, and missed
slightly short outside off, punched wide of Edwards at extra cover for a quick single
slides it on a good length outside off, steered wide of point for a single
bowled flat down the leg side, it's swept straight to fine leg for a single
tossed up on middle, pushed down the ground towards long-off
floating it full on leg stump, tickled behind square for an easy single
shortish on leg stump, turned away past square leg for one more
slightly short on the off, moves back and chops it down in front of point
drives that on the up, landed around the good length and he crunched it straight to point
slightly short with some amount of width, played gently towards point
Aggression from Rohit, gave him the charge and Sammy pushed it full, he got to the pitch and cracked him over extra cover, sweetly struck, came off the meat and cleared the ropes
counter-attack, this, short from Sammy and Rohit latches on, slapping it back over the bowler's head for a one bounce four
shortish outside off, run down to third man for a single
angling it down on leg stump, tickles it down towards fine leg for a single

Parthiv's stay is over, he had got away on many occasions, but not this time, a flat delivery that rushes on outside off, he rocked back for the cut, but the zip on the ball meant he ended up slicing it straight to point, India in big trouble
gets forward and tucks it with the turn to short fine leg
gets bat in front of pad to push a fuller one back to the bowler
lots of turn on this one, stays low too, Rohit has to reach out a long way as he attempts to cut, gets an underedge past short third man
tossed up and angled in on leg, good bowling, he gets well forward to defend
pulls out the slog-sweep from nowhere, and picks up a couple wide of deep midwicket
hangs back in the crease and tries to guide it past point but gets it straight to him
gets behind the line to defend calmly on the off side
bit of bounce on this as it is bowled from wide of the crease, he gets on top to push it in the direction of point
tries the short ball, gets up too slowly and he is able to pull it away awkwardly for a single through square leg
gets the bat out to this length ball and steers it down to third man
tries to drive a fuller one down the ground, but gets too far across and gets it off an inside edge on the leg side
lovely delivery, fired in on leg, Rohit is caught in the crease and has a poke as it turns away sharply, fortunately the edge falls short of slip
fuller ball now and rohit drives it forcefully off the front foot to sweeper cover
the flat and quick one that got Parthiv, Raina does not look to force the cut and guides it to point
takes it on the pads as he pushes forward outside the line, lot of turn on that one
gets the single off the pads backward of square leg
has him lunging forward as he flights it around middle and off, pushed away with the turn towards extra cover

straight out of the IPL is this forcing slog-swat-heave from Suresh Raina and he holes out to cover, length ball, with four down, he had no reason to play this shot, but he does, and perishes, goes for his booming favourite shot over wide long on, but gets a huge outside edge that loops tamely on the off side
comes forward to defend calmly off the front foot on the off side
shuffles across and tucks it through vacant square leg for a single
walks across and smothers a back of a length ball close to the crease
gets outside the line and works it wide of midwicket for a single
they take on midwicket for a tight run and make it safely in the end
gets forward and lazily whips it against the turn down to long on

that will be the end of YK Pathan, and maybe India in this match, Lendl Simmons is engulfed in football fashion by his team-mates, and understandably so, this leap would have done van der Sar, Casillas and all those top guns proud, Yusuf got too far across to sweep a flat delivery, got it in the air but seemed to have got away as it was headed over Simmons at short midwicket, but Simmons watched it all the way, and just as it was passing him he went airborne to his right to bring it down with one hand
played out off the back foot to point
stands in the crease and lets it turn away from him and then guides it to point
calmly patted back down the track off the front foot
comes forward again to defend off the front foot
goes on the back foot to work it away down to long on
tries the short ball, it does not get up much but it has the desired effect as harbhajan sways out of the line nevertheless
another short ball that does not get up much and Harbhajan ends up swinging weakly in the air over the line of the ball
worked away towards square leg for a single
direct hit at the striker;s but Harbhajan lives on, he did not drag his bat in but still managed to beat the throw as they went for a tight run

loopy slower one from Pollard well outside off, Harbhajan tries to adjust, gets a bottom edge but Baugh is alert behind the wicket, Pollard looks at Harbhajan with a twinkle in his eyes, his IPL team-mate smiles
fuller one driven without power towards extra cover
tossed up ball around middle and leg, Rohit reins himself in and pushes it back to Bishoo
sharp turn but way outside off stump, he reaches out to cut it towards sweeper cover for a single
there is the outside edge as Harbhajan pushes half forward but it runs past slip
cut hard off the back foot but right to point, Bishoo has overstepped
goes hard for the slog over midwicket, long on gets around and clangs the 'catch'
gets the single off a flowing front foot cover drive to keep the strike
Rohit leaves one that is some way outside off, Pollard does not like the wide call, he is justified as well as it was well inside the line
huge appeal for caught behind, Baugh is convinced completely, it nipped in and was going down leg, not called a wide this time, was there a bit of thigh pad?
gets off the strike with a single down towards long off
Harbhajan walks across and pats a length ball towards extra cover
short ball in to the body, again it does no get up much and Harbhajan is able to pull it through square leg on one leg
shuffles to clip a full delivery off his toes wide of Bishoo at midwicket
slower one outside off, Harbhajan gets forward early and blocks it away in the end, mutual smiling again among the IPL team-mates
with a whippy action, he gets it to come back in from a length, Rohit plays a Watson-style chop-steer down to third man from close to the body
walks outside the line and swat-pulls it on a leg wide of deep square leg
tucked away off the back foot to deep midwicket for a single
tries to walk outside off and target deep square leg again, but Russell pings him back with the bouncer
short ball that takes off around off and Harbhajan goes for it, smashing the ball in to the ground with a forehand of a shot
played away towards point
tries to get him with one that is angled in around off stump, keeps low too but Harbhajan is able to stab it away towards long on
the short ball comes so slowly off the pitch that Harbhajan has all the time to abandon his attempted pull and guide it for a single behind point
Rohit earns a boundary, it is a gift, low full toss outside leg and on the pads, he flicks it easily to the deep square leg boundary
gets an inside edge as he looks to go through extra cover
now he manages to get it off the middle of the bat, but Sammy at extra cover saves a run with a huge dive to his left
this time he will get a single down the ground
yet another time, Pollard foxes Harbhajan with a slower one, batsman gets forward early but has to adjust to block the full delivery away
Rohit survives, he got in to a tangle as he looked to swivel and pull a short ball, but got an edge that bounced quite close to the stumps
the one that nips back in has Rohit in trouble, struck on the pads, Russell leaps high in the air in confident appeal, it would have bounced over the stumps, and is correctly not given
Rohit gets off the strike and to the other end with a single to third man
full toss homing in for middle stump, Harbhajan is squared up as he tried to go through midwicket but in the end stabs it away towards mid off
diving stop near square leg but they have enough time to get the single, Harbhajan did not time the pull well enough
rohit eases forward and picks up a single to sweeper cover off a fuller delivery
slower one from Pollard, Rohit adjusts the front foot movement to push to point
goes for a whippy drive through extra cover but an inside edge takes the ball towards midwicket
pushes a full ball angled in past a diving bowler for a single towards long off
gets forward but checks the drive to find extra cover
gets forward again and again checks the shot to push a wobbling full delivery back to the bowler
gets well forward to a length ball that bounces a tad and he pushes it away on the off side
shuffles to whip a back of a length ball coming in with the angle past a diving midwicket
Harbhajan has been shuffling across now and then but hasn't yet gone hard at the ball, again he reins himself in and pushes it away on the off side
there is width this time outside off, so he goes for the slash and gets a thick edge to third man
low full toss that Rohit meets well forward and eases down to long on
dropped it was a tough chance, Martin the substitute at extra cover went leaping to his left but the ball flew just past his fingers as Harbhajan drove a full delivery
works it on the leg side for a single to retain the strike
guides a widish one past a diving Martin at point for a single to sweeper cover
stays in the crease to work it through square leg
he is not taking on Pollard, getting forward all the time but checking his drive at the last moment
half-forward and pats it calmly on the off side
stays in the crease, beside the line and pushes a length ball to extra cover
Harbhajan and the waiting game have to diverge at some point, he walks down the track to pull a short of a length ball, gets a single towards square leg off a big inside edge
goes for the yorker right away, does not get it in the blockhole, Harbhajan manages to stab it towards mid on who dives over the ball and concedes the run
a languid Rohit continues to pick up the single, this time to third man
Harbhajan was expecting the short ball, it arrives and he pulled it hard to deep midwicket
opens him up with a pacy one straightening outside off, rohit does well to adjust and defend
drives towards sweeper cover for a single
almost got him, almost, moving away after coming in with the angle outside off, Harbhajan has a waft and is beaten
goes deep in the crease to pat a length ball back to the bowler
drives a length ball off the front foot to get a single to sweeper cover
stays in the crease and stands tall to guide a length ball towards point
whoa, Harbhajan gets in to a tangle as he looks to clip one coming in, ball rolls away on the off side in the end, some extra bounce surprised him
similar delivery, played away in to leg side
fuller delivery floated in with the angle, he drives it along the ground to long on
you can;t fault him for intent, he walks across the stumps expecting the short one and pulls it savagely, only to get a single to long leg
whip-pulls a short of a length ball without any fuss past the man at midwicket
that could have been close, Harbhajan went pushing hard from the crease and almost spooned a catch to mid off
tight defence from Harbhajan off a fuller ball, Roach kicks the air in frustration as he oversteps
the free hits havent been costing too much today, Harbhajan sets himself up to have a mighty swing, but cannot connect as the ball goes close to off stump, straightened a bit
played away towards midwicket
goes back to throw his bat a short of a length ball, but cannot hit it wide of sweeper cover, bounces in front of him
he wanted to attack this length ball, but decided to pat it on the off side in the end
does not pick up the slower one and pushes it in the air down to long on
Rohit gets to a patient half-century with a whip off his toes wide of long on, he was playing a lot of shots at the start but adjusted to settle in after all those men fell around him
picks up another single on the leg side in front of square

Harbhajan had decided that he was going through midwicket, so what if the ball was miles outside off, so what if he had to reach out a long way, he did so and collected a single to deep midwicket with a fetching pull
similar widish ball has Rohit reaching out to drive it through cover but he is beaten
Harbhajan has taken a liking to midwicket, he rushes around in the crease and goes for a pull to a not so short ball and finds the man at midwicket
tried to go through midwicket again, it was the quicker one, he could only push it back to the bowler
this time he goes down on a knee for the sweep off a full delivery and gets it towards short fine leg
turning away from a flat trajectory and a short length, but Rohit's cut finds sweeper cover
Harbhajan gets away again, he slashes and gets the ball just past short third man for a couple
rushes on to him as he tries to force it on the off side, Bishoo fields

that has to be one of the shots of the day, it looked like Rohit would get a single as he stood in the crease and punched a length ball wide of point, then it looked like he would get a couple, but he had timed it so well that sweeper cover could not get around in time
played away off the pads towards midwicket
Rohit gets away. it was the slower one and rohit was drawn forward in to the lofted drive, but the ball fell well short of the man running in from long off
Harbhajan continues to get runs as he walks across the stumps, turns it from a foot outside off towards long on
gets on top of one that bounces a tad outside off, and cuts it away to backward point
gets into a tangle as this one comes on quickly, he misses the flick and takes it on the body
lots of turn for Bishoo, Harbhajan stands feet wide apart and swats it down to long off
well bowled, tossed it up, got it to grip and turn past his attempted extra cover drive
goes for the sweep this time off a fuller ball and gets it away towards deep midwkcet
more swatting down the ground off the back foot and he picks up another single
goes on the back foot to cut but cannot get it past point
gets him to drive off the front foot, manages to get the outside edge but it falls just short of a diving point
beaten outside off as he tries to glide it from close to off stump
unfurls a pleasing straight drive but finds the bowler in the way
shuffles across and tucks it off the hip in front of square leg
Harbhajan walks across as always and whips a fuller one but straight to midwicket
is that a chance? looks like, Harbhajan whipped a full delivery straight down the track, and it went through Sammy who has a disappointed look on his face
Rohit goes for maximum and gets it, all the way over deep midwicket, brings it down to run-a-ball, stands tall and swings through the line
Harbhajan is getting away with his peculiar method, again he shuffles across and whips a full delivery through midwicket

another chance, that should have been taken, it is Sammy again, Harbhajan  continues to target midwicket, it was Sammy this time, who was in the way of a powerful pull, got his hands to it to his left but it burst through and ran in to the boundary
neat work from Harbhajan, it was too full to be put away through midwicket, so he bent the knee to lap it wide of fine leg, some hands there
wallop! goes Harbhajan, Russellesque to Russell, stands motionless, allows the length ball to come on and murders it over long on with a fearsome swing of the bat
cannot get to this one, beaten by the slow offcutter, good come back from the bowler

Harbhajan is gone this time, the love of midwicket has consumed him, but he has more than played his part, walked across looking to flick it with the angle over midwicket, but got a leading edge that settled in to the hands of Baugh
goes back to a length ball but manages to whip it for a single to long on
stabbed away on the off side
gets off the mark with a tight single, there is a direct hit but the batsman is well in at the striker's end
loopy full slower one, Rohit is surprised and hangs his bat out, ball goes under it to the keeper
another slower one, Rohit manages to dig it out but Sammy cuts off the single with a tidy sprint to his right
gets the flick away towards short fine leg but cannot get the single, had rushed a long way out before turning back
he has been on the shorter side, and another one of those is bashed off the back foot wide of long off who does well to get around to it
beaten outside off stump, he went wafting at it from the crease without moving his feet
throws his bat at a tossed up ball but gets away, because he mistimed it the ball fell well in front of long off
rushing straight on from a length but Rohit had watched it all the way and was able to tuck it through midwicket

bang! PK takes off a lot of pressure by dispatching Bishoo in to the stands beyond the sightscreen, it was right in the slot actually, beneath his bat, he reached out a bit and walloped it over the bowler
goes on the back foot and pushes with the turn towards covers
uses the generous angle on this one darted on the pads to pick up a couple to deep midwicket
Roach does not help his team's cause by spraying it wide down leg, rohit tries to help it fine but misses
can't connect again but this time he will pick up a leg bye towards square leg
makes room and wants to go through cover with a forcing punch but cannot beat the infield
swipe! slower one from Roach, but it is too short and PK gets front leg out of the way to send it soaring over mid off with a neat agricultural scythe
this is pretty poor stuff from Roach, another wide sprayed way down leg
they take on mid off with a tight single, if the throw was to the non-striker;s PK could have been in trouble, but Rohit makes it at the other end even as the throw comes in to Baugh
tries the yorker around middle and leg, Rohit calmly pats it past the non-striker for a single

PK wants the run, he wants it dearly, Rohit is not even looking at him after taking a short of a length ball on the body, even as the ball rolled towards point, PK hastily applied the brakes and shifted in to reverse
cut from close to the body for a single wide of point
PK is doing it without any fuss, good old swiping, front leg goes out of the way, and he flat-bats a length ball even flatter over long off
goes for a fuller length, PK is not in control as he tries to force it down the ground but still picks up the single to long on
direct hit and Rohit could have been gone, he flicked to square leg and set off right away, Sammy missed at the non-striker;s
now PK picks up a run, shuffling to tuck it to short fine leg
shuffles across and opens up completely, Pollard gets some bounce but he is able to nudge for a single to square leg
the leg side field is pretty deep and Rohit picks up an easy single with a clip through vacant midwicket
front foot push from PK but the off side close men are on the edge of the circle and he too gets an easy single
almost in the blockhole, Rohit digs it back to the bowler who wants to throw it on to the non-striker;s stumps, PK scurries back
smack! there is not much of a gap at covers, but Rohit showcases his class by making room, opening the face to crash a full delivery through that narrow gap
for once Rohit is not throwing it away, and that is pleasing to see, shuffles and flicks for a single through midwicket
fires in the yorker, Rohit stays in the crease to dig it with an open face backward of point
slightly off the mark goes the yorker, Rohit manages to guide it past point and well wide of third man for a couple
that is the series for India, Rohit has swatted Roach to the deep midwicket boundary, it is a no-ball as well
